overview: Evolve Media is a design and development crossmedia solutions agency that has been reinventing the connection between consumer and brand since 1994. Experience design, strategy, technology. Interactive and non- interactive, online and offline, mobile applications, hosting, search engine optimization, email marketing, print, logo design, branding, marketing communications, corporate identity systems and much more. Recently, the ‘Evolve Media’ name has become a popular trend in the design, development and online industry. While this might create some kind of confusion, this profile is representing the only Evolve Media that has been an integral influence evolving technical and design trends for over 19 years.
